name: Raushan Raj
title: Full Stack Web Developer & Cybersecurity Enthusiast
tagline: Building secure, scalable web applications from frontend to deployment with a security-first mindset.
subtitle: B.Tech Computer Engineering @ Thapar Institute of Engineering & Technology
focus: Full Stack Development • Cybersecurity • Ethical Hacking

about.intro: I'm a B.Tech Computer Engineering student at Thapar Institute of Engineering & Technology (TIET), specializing in building secure and scalable web applications. I cover everything from frontend UI to backend logic and deployment, with a strong interest in Cybersecurity and Ethical Hacking.
about.approach: My development philosophy centers on writing secure, maintainable code. I don't just build features, I architect systems with security considerations baked in from the start. Whether it's implementing role-based access control with Supabase RLS, securing authentication flows with Firebase, or designing scalable database schemas with PostgreSQL, I approach every project with both a builder's creativity and a defender’s mindset.
about.current: Currently, I'm deepening my expertise in full-stack development with React, Node.js, and Express, while actively practicing offensive security techniques through EC-Council CEH v13 and CND v3 Labs. This dual perspective makes me a more thoughtful and security-aware engineer.
